Description: The incident was sent for trace-back purposes.

The incident was sent to request aid in
        mitigating the described activity.

The incident was sent to comply with reporting
        requirements.

The incident was sent to convey indicators that should
        be monitored.

The incident was sent for purposes specified in the
        Expectation class.

A value used to indicate that this attribute is
        extended and the actual value is provided using the
        corresponding ext-* attribute.  See Section 5.1.1 of [RFC7970].
